cast.name: 理查德·阿米蒂奇 Richard Armitage
多米妮克·杰克逊 Dominique Jackson
迈克尔·德克鲁兹 Michael D'Cruze

trans_title: 急诊室的故事(英版) 第十六季
introduction: Craig Parker - Richard ArmitageRichard played Craig Parker in one episode of this BBC long-running drama serial shown in 2001. 'Casualty' started in 1986 and is still running on BBC1.Richard appeared in the following episode shown on 29 December 2001:Series 16, episode 17 - Playing with FireEpisode summary: It looks like being a bleak new year for the Holby accident and emergency team as Lara finally finds Patrick and rushes him back into the department, where Max risks suspension in order to treat the heartbroken doctor. Meanwhile, Philippa feels the pressure as she struggles to cope with a staff shortage and ropes Lara in to help with a snakebite victim.The episode 'Playing with Fire' was watched by 9.57 million viewers (source: Wikipedia)The episode can be seen on youtube in several parts. The first part of the episode is below. Richard appears at 5m 30s.
chinese_title: 急诊室的故事(英版) 第十六季
